Package nespoli.dolci.wat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddComment
    This activity is used by user and permits to write a comment and post it on the database
    AddItinerary
    This class permits to add an appointment to the initinerary (only from the coordinator side)
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BuildConfig  
    CoordMenu
    This activity is used by a the coordinator user and displays the menu of the coordinator and permits to do the basic operation.
    CreateGroup
    Activity that permits to a coordinator to create/rejoin the group
    HelpActivity
    Here a HELP item is created to guide an user
    InsertPic
    This class is used to upload a picture to the server
    Itinerary
    This class is called to take a look to the itinerary (only by a normal user)
    ItineraryCoord
    Activity that permits to see/add appointments to the trip
    JoinCreate
    Activity that permits to an user to choose if login to an existing trip or create a new one
    JoinGroup
    Activity that permits an user to join an existing group
    JSONParser
    This class is used to parse the JSON message exchanged by the app and the server
    ListOfUser
    Activity that shows to the coordinator the list of the users logged to the actual group
    Login
    This activity shows the login screen
    Manifest  
    Manifest.permission  
    MapsActivity
    Activity that opens a fragment into the app and displays the map opened on the position of the user.
    PicFromUrl
    This activity permits to retrieve an image from the server
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.mipmap  
    R.raw  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    ReadComments
    This activity is used to read the comments of the groupID
    Register
    This activity is used to register a new user on the system
    TakePhoto
    This activity is used to take a picture and store it into the memory of the device
    UserMenu
    This activity is used by a normal user and displays the menu of the user and permits to do the basic operation.
